resources.string: Moving to your Bus stop list

Author: James Oresti 
Version Number 1 
 Instructions: 
 1. To get new news stories click "GET TOP NEWS STORIES" in the top right of the screen. 
2. To save story, click on the story and then click Save story. 
3. To view saved stories on the home screen click "GET SAVED STORIES". 
4. To delete a saved story, click on the story and then click the "DELETE" button.
Search for key words in headline
Are you sure you\'d like to delete this story?
